title: @Riot if you want to nerf Fiora properly...
body: Make her Q a fixed distance dash, and give me credit.

replies.body:
I think moreover it's the interaction between her passive (Spotting vitals) and the Q auto targeting champions/vitals above all else. The fact the Q cooldown is then halved when it connects with something just adds this needless third dimension to the party. I think you're right in saying the dash is the potentially the problem, but it travels a fixed distance, it's just that the actual hit auto acquires targets which warps perception!

tl;dr Q is strong, Passive makes it even stronger {{champion:114}} is pretty damn good!

For Snakeowen, the E is disgusting but it's a high CD at least (once per teamfight)

the dash doesn't travel a fixed distance though??? you could potentially hover your cursor under yourself and use the Q as an auto reset, they should change her passive so that vitals disappear when the target leaves Fiora's field of view, eg. disappears into brush.
